entry.title: Stealth One Piece
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Performance One Pieces
Price: 215.00

The new Stealth One-piece is the perfect workout all-in-one, detailed with a sleek combination of high gloss and matt recycled performance fabrics shaping the torso. The upper body has a built-in bra with removable bra cups and a mesh back for ventilation with high visibility signature chevron details.   Wear this for low-mid intensity workouts by itself or style it to-and-from the gym. 

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small. This style runs true to size. 

Fabrics made in Italy, 65% Recycled Polyamide, 35% Elastane. Garment made in Portugal.

entry.title: Mini Pivot Skirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Outerwear
Price: 130.00

The Mini Pivot skirt is the perfect light-weight summer cover-up designed to be worn over our technical knit hotties, long leggings or one piece either at the gym or to take you to and from.  Available in limited numbers the Mini Pivot Skirt is a short mesh layering skirt, with a drawstring waistband to secure your perfect fit.  MAIN: 100% Polyester

Model is 5'10 / 182cm, waist 24” / 61cm, hips 34” / 86cm

The Mini Pivot skirt may re-shape when wet, should be hung when storing and drying.

entry.title: Technical Knit Sleeveless Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 65.00

Update your workout basics with the super-soft comfort of the Lucas Hugh circular knit, sustainable sleeveless t-shirt. Built with second skin Qnova polyamide, this classic sleeveless t-shirt is lightweight, breathable and has excellent moisture control. A foundational piece for any workout wardrobe. Made from 100% Qnova Polyamide - more than 50% recycled materials, and produced with lower emissions and reduced water consumption.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size XS/S

entry.title: Performance Cross Back Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 35.00

This lightweight, fitted tank is a must-have for any wardrobe. The fine, moisture-wicking fabric, internal support at the chest and mesh insert at the small of the back ensure comfort when working out, while the slim fit, dipped hem, delicate straps and loop over cross back make it eminently wearable for any occasion. Made from 72% Polyamide 28% Elastane.

Model is 5'10 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Technical Knit Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 55.00

Super soft white Technical Knit Sports Bra (without removable bra cups) with a scoop front neckline and racer back finish. Features ventilation mesh panels under bust and back chest, with added support of compression knit lining to give you support where you need it. Suitable for low to medium impact activities. Made from 94% Polyamide 6% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small.

entry.title: Technical Knit Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 55.00

Super soft black technical knit sports bra with removable bra cups, sustainably made in Europe with Qnova recycled yarns. A scoop front neckline and racer back finish, features ventilation mesh panels at the under bust and back chest, with added support of compression knit lining to give you support where you need it. Suitable for low to medium impact activities. This bra is made from 91% recycled Qnova Polyamide, 9% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Technical Knit Hotties
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Shorts and Pants
Price: 60.00

Our high-waisted seamless technical knit hottie shorts in white are sustainably made in Europe with Qnova recycled yarns. These shorts are super comfortable with a knitted waistband, built in seamless brief and soft knitted leg. They are quick dry, moisture wicking and great for all types of sport from yoga to running. Made from 91% recycled Qnova Polyamide, 9% Elastane.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small.

entry.title: Technical Knit 7/8 Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Leggings
Price: 85.00

Super-soft comfort of the Lucas Hugh technical knit 7/8 leggings, now sustainably made from recycled Qnova yarn. Without any zips, seams or clasps, they fit like a second skin. These leggings are perfect for floor-based exercises such as yoga, pilates, and dance. Knitted with a compression weave on the upper leg, seat and waist and softer lighter weave down the leg. Built-in seamless brief for added coverage, and ankle logo. Sustainably made in Europe from 91% Onova Recycled Polyamide 9% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, waist 24 / 61cm, hips 34 / 86cm and wears size small

entry.title: Pivot Pleated Skirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Outerwear
Price: 135.00

PROMOTION EXCLUSION

This style is a Lucas Hugh exclusive. Make moves in the Pivot Skirt, a midi-length mesh layering skirt, with a drawstring waistband to secure your perfect fit, pockets and front slits for movement. Designed to be worn over leggings to transition your look from gym to cafe. MAIN: 100% Polyester

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, waist 24” / 61cm, hips 34” / 86cm

The Pivot skirt may re-shape when wet, should be hung when storing and drying.

entry.title: Racer Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 30.00

The Sierra geometric print is carefully placed on the racer bra to flatter the bust while the bronze technical taping shapes the racer-back design. Merging performance and style, this piece is made in Italian fabric with mesh ventilation panels to enhance breathability for your workout. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Technical Knit Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 25.00

This super-soft racer back sports bra adds a new level of comfort for low-intensity workouts. Designed in fabric that is fits like second skin yet is very breathable. This rich Maroon colour offers an alternative to your everyday black. Made from 94% Polyamide, 6% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 50.00

This bra is a silhouette-enhancing design that offers a supportive lift. Made from 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Flux Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 30.00

This sleek, racer-back sports bra is adorned in high-gloss technical taping that not only supports but contours the female form. Crafted from Italian fabric and an elasticated hem to ensure unrestricted yet supported movement. Made from 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane. 

Model is 5'11  / 182cm, waist 24 / 61cm, hips 34 / 86cm and wears size small

entry.title: Technical Knit Capri Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Leggings
Price: 65.00

Update your workout basics with the super-soft comfort of the Lucas Hugh circular knit capri leggings. Without any zips, seams or clasps, they fit like a second skin so are perfect for floor-based exercise such as yoga, Pilates and dance. They feature contrasting texture, breathable pinhole panels at the hips and knee and a Lucas Hugh reflective logo on the left thigh. With a built-in under-short for added protection and support. Made from 94% Polyamide 6% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, waist 24" / 61cm, hips 34" / 86cm and wears size small.

Inner leg measurements: XS 26cm / S 27cm / M 28cm / L 29cm.
